subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Southern California filed an appeal with the N.C.A.A.  on Friday, asking that several sanctions on its football program be reduced because they are “too severe” and “inconsistent with precedent.”
snippet: Southern California filed an appeal with the N.C.A.A.  on Friday, asking that several sanctions on its football program be reduced because they are “too severe” and “inconsistent with precedent.”
